arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Borussia Dortmund v Fluminense
arts.sum: Here are the confirmed teams for Dortmund’s opening Club World Cup fixture.

arts.ttl: Fluminense vs. Borussia Dortmund: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: After a strong end to the Bundesliga season, Borussia Dortmund enter the Club World Cup in high spirits and their tournament begins against Fluminense on Tuesday. This is the first competitive fixture between Fluminense and Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Jobe Bellingham could make first start for Dortmund vs. Fluminense
arts.sum: According to Bild, Jobe Bellingham could be thrown straight into Borussia Dortmund’s starting lineup for their Club World Cup opener.

arts.ttl: How to watch Fluminense vs Borussia Dortmund for FREE: TV channel and live stream for Club World Cup today
arts.sum: Dortmund kick off their Club World Cup campaign against the 2023 runners-up
